thread.section_title: Hotel Mademoiselle - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great little find
thread.title_full: Great little find - Review of Hotel Mademoiselle, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LH A
title: Great little find
text:
Very clean and well decorated, all the staff helpful and friendly, and the breakfast buffet was really good. A decent sized and scrupulously clean ensuite bathroom. The hotel is minutes from the Gare du Nord and De l'Est, so is super handy for Eurostar travellers.
Room Tip: Try to get a room away from the lift, as it clanks somewhat. We were in 401. See more room tips
